feed.title: SAP Community - SAP Predictive Maintenance and Service
feed.subtitle: SAP Predictive Maintenance and Service Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Counter Based Maintenance - Warnings in Regulated industry
entry.content:
HI All,

I am wondering if anyone has any suggestions on how to create warnings for counter based in SAP.

Our counter is set in 100hrs. Our PMs are issued 70 hours and at 90 hours i will like send warning to team that they have 10 hours of running time left before PM and it will deviate our Regulatory rules.

Does SAP has the capacity to send this warnings (emails, or other ways)? Do you have any suggests, help here will be greatly appreciated.

Thanks

Kofi

entry.title: My Inbox app- Plant maintenance
entry.content: My Inbox FIORI app has been activated,but no Plant maintenance notification/Order are reflecting. What are the configuration required from Plant maintenance perspective?

entry.title: Planned date performance based maintenace strategy plan
entry.content:
While creating performance based maintenace strategy plan the work order is released before the counter reached the set measures,

for example i put the order to be released when the counter reach 50k kilometers but due to the planned date the order released when its only 40k .

So, can i disable the planned date and order released only when it reachs 50k ??

entry.title: Work order printing in 2023
entry.content:
Hi Guys.

I Was wondering if there is an SAP version where I don't need to print off the work orders.

I cannot believe that I waste 2 days of my week printing, confirming with a stamp, TECO and archiving work orders. It's 2023 and I cannot understand why SAP does not have a digital way of completing maintenance straight from our Technician's Laptops. Paper less is the way.

i already installed the SAP software in my my laptop but i no access for it

PS: i live in FRANCE

entry.title: SAP on premise test in local
entry.content:

I am new to SAP, I am currently trying to make some test using SAP.

Our client want to have our low code application to communicate with their SAP on premise environment.

To test that I was wondering If I could simulate an SAP environment on my local machine, and if so, how to do it?

Every suggestion is much appreciate.

Thanks a lot.

entry.title: Export data from Maintenance Plan, Maintenance Item and task lists
entry.content: I'm trying to find a way to export data from a number of Maintenance Plans/Maintenance Items in particular: frequency of execution and durations (hours) of the associated tasks - can anyone suggest a suitable T code to achieve this? Thanks

entry.title: How EMI works??
entry.content:
Hi

I know monthly equated emi and it's formula also

But if I choose quarterly, half yearly or yearly then when I have to pay my first emi in next month or depending on quarterly half yearly or yearly ex my disbursement date is 11th nov and cycle date is 5th of month then if I choose quarterly then my first emi will be on 5th dec or 5th may

And how graded emi works I tried to search bt I can't find in Google.

entry.title: SAP PM - Gage Calibration Strategy ?
entry.content: Situation, I am attempting to setup a gage calibration process in S/4, I have master data setup, I have Characteristic and Measuring Points with upper and lower limit defined. I have general task setup with 24 month strategy pack. What i can not figure out is how to setup a a multi condition strategy to schedule a work order at 24th from last calibration date or when the calipers fall out of tolerance example, I have a digital caliper that needs to be calibrated every 24 months or when measuring tolerance fall out of upper or lower limits... i.e. upper limit is 1.05 mm and lower limit is .99, normal is 1.02.. there is a tolerance +/- .03

entry.title: HOW TO CHANGE COUNTER BASED MAINTENANCE PLAN INTERVAL IF COUNTER IS CHANGED?
entry.content:
Hello,

How to change counter based (hour) maintenance plan interval, if counter meter (h) is changed during interval and new counter start 0h (cannot set current hour value to meter)?

Example (strategig hierarchical)

1.Maintenance "small" 500 hour

2.Maintenance "medium" 1500 hour

3. Maintenance "big" 3000 Hour

Counter rmeter change in 250 h

entry.title: Visual Studio Code - SAP Fiori elements
entry.content:

working, code 200 ok, however, when using visual studio code the service is not available, 
with the error:
Authentication incorrect! AxiosError: Request failed with status code 403

I connected via on premise, it connected well to the sap client, 
but the service was unavailable, could someone please help me.

Grateful

entry.title: Maintenance Single Cycle Plan
entry.content:
Hi all,

I'm creating a Maintenance Single Cycle Plan. 

My single cicle is 3000000 pieces on an Equipment that have a counter measuring point.

Call horizon at 93%.

Scheduling period: it's possible to indicate 12000000 pieces and not 48 months?

Thanks a lot!

entry.title: How to manage maintenance plan
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

In case I need to replace some of the parts before the planned maintenance call date

For example Plan 1 Year

Plan date : 1-JAN-2024

Complete date : 1-JAN-2024

Next Plan : 1-JAN-2025

Item 10 : Replace belt.
Item 20 : Replace bearing.
But Item 10 belt was damage on 1-MAR-2024 and I replaced the belt which meant it didn't go as planned. What do I need to do with my maintenance plan? In the event that I release a maintenance plan (as planned on 1-JAN-2025), if I release on 1-MAR-2024, that means that other plans It will not be processed. In this case, what should I do?

Regard

entry.title: SAP Asset Manager official app - Offline maps - permissions on newer Android
entry.content:
I want to use Offline maps in SAP Asset Manager mobile application. Some time ago I built SAP Service and Asset Manager in the BTP cockpit. Version: SAM version 2305, Android 10/11 (or lover). I installed it on my Android devices and copied a .tpk file (my map). Then I had to go to the permissions (in Android settings) and grant permission to access files.

Apps -> Permissions -> Permissions -> Files -> See more apps that can access all files -> (scroll and find) SAM
|O| Allow access to manage all files
| | Don't allow

So far so good.

But when I install the official SAP Service and Asset Manager from Google Play, the application does not have permission to access my offline map (I cannot grand the permission). In one device, I do not have SAM in the list of applications to grant File access permission. On another Android device, I have a missing option.

Android Settings -> Apps -> Permissions -> Permissions -> Files and media -> (scroll and find) SAM
|O| Allow management of all files    ! the option is missing for this app !
| | Allow access to media only
| | Don't allow

My older SAM built by BTP with an Android API level lower than 29 has this option in Android Settings.

In Android, can I somehow grant the permission even when .apk does not say the permission is required? I suppose the permission has to be specified in AndroidManifest.xml and this file can be distributed only with the .apk? I need to use the official application from the store.

entry.title: How to add equipment in logsheet
entry.content:
Equipment was not displayed in the logsheet because, during the equipment transfer process, the location status was mistakenly set to 'dismantled' from 12.11.2024. The equipment's final location was marked as 'installed' only on 28.11.2024. As result, the logsheet does not show data for 16 days.

Please suggest what actions should be taken to resolve this issue.

PLM Enterprise Asset Management (EAM)/Plant Maintenance (PM) SAP Plant Connectivity

entry.title: Request for SAP S/4HANA Plant Maintenance Fiori Demo Videos & Resources
entry.content:
Hi everyone, I need to demonstrate key SAP S/4HANA Plant Maintenance processes using the Fiori Demo environment, and we already have access to the SAP Demo system. Could anyone help by sharing reference videos, online resources, or YouTube links that include data models and step-by-step demonstrations? Any insights, links, or references to hands-on demonstrations would be highly appreciated! Specifically, we are looking for Fiori demo videos covering the following topics:

L4 Business Process Topics (BPD Topics):

  • Phase In / Phase Out of Equipment
  • Non-Routine Maintenance (Reactive, Minor, Emergency Maintenance)
  • Routine/Preventive Maintenance
  • Refurbishment (In-House / External)
  • Condition-Based Maintenance
  • Maintenance Planning
  • Resource Scheduling Management
  • Shutdown Maintenance
  • Routine Maintenance (Work Clearance Management)                                                                            

    Thanks in advance.

Thanks in advance for your time and help!

Best regards,
Sarvan Kumar

entry.title: SAP EHS integation to PM - Task List and PRT not showing up when adding control
entry.content:
We want to add a task list or other PRT to an existing control on a risk assessment. For some reason, task lists and PRTs don't show up in the search, and due to that reason, we are not able to add them to safety control. 

These are safety measures types.
